name: The ship exits its final jump within a star that has recently expanded into a Red Giant. The ship, and all those within, are destroyed.
The ship exits warp space revealing nothing but debris and dust. Perhaps there was once something here worth visiting, but now it is forever lost to the void.
The Site is a large derelict ship! The ship automatically docks in it.
The crew’s ship touches down on a planet.
This Site is a station orbiting a planet or moon.
The ship docks in an Àrsaidh base inside an asteroid or planetoid.
